text: Proudly serving the CommonwealthFor Virginians, by Virginia.The VirginiaState Corporation Commission (SCC) is an independent state agency responsible for overseeing many business and economic interests in Virginia. The SCC is organized as an independent department of state government with delegated administrative, legislative, and judicial powers.The Health Benefit Exchange, a division of the SCC, operates Virginias Insurance Marketplace with a mission to increase access to affordable and reliable health coverage for Virginians. Virginias Insurance Marketplace connects eligible Virginians who are not insured by their employer, Medicaid, or Medicare to health insurance options. The Marketplace is Virginias own state-based health insurance marketplace where consumers can shop for, compare, and purchase high-quality and affordable health insurance plans. Advisory Committee Our Advisory Committee members are leaders in their fields and share the commitment of Virginias Insurance Marketplace's commitment to act in the best interest of Virginians.
